oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from William Lytton Oral History Interview, 2011 February 24
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with William Lytton, conducted on February 24, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons and Jared Brennan as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Lytton describes the support he received from church, friends and volunteers in the aftermath of the May 2010 flood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lytton, William, 1936- --Interviews
